resources.string: Internet access is required to connect to our servers for booking services, syncing data, and receiving real-time updates about your home service appointments.
Location access helps us find nearby service providers and show you relevant services in your area. This improves service quality and reduces travel time for our providers.
Notifications keep you updated about your service appointments, provider updates, and important booking confirmations. You can disable this anytime in settings.
Karyakarta connects you with trusted home service providers for cleaning, maintenance, and repair services. Book, track, and manage your home services all in one place.
Your privacy is important to us. We only collect necessary information to provide our services and never share your personal data with third parties without your consent.
